case.state: Power Elite reporting for duty, and also for booty!
Power Elite Yuichi Jin-san, ready to see butts and kick... Well, butts.
Special Agent Yuichi Jin of Border, as well as sensual lover.
Yo, I'm Jin. Anyone want a rice cracker?
Watch out folks, don't get hit!
How?
You give off a pretty nasty vibe, Aaravi. But that just makes me wanna fight you more.
I see you really like going for the old-school look, huh? Nice to meetcha, names Jin.
A handsome cowboy who also tries to change the future for his own needs? Try hard much.
The future tells me you'll either become my long-term rival or we'll hook up.
Man, talk about a try-hard.
Oi, Amy-chan, shouldn't you be in school?

Wow! Mahi-chan, can you get a picture of Alpha and I?
What's with the blindfold? Feeling confident you'll win?
Ah, I see. You're confident you're gonna win, so you wore a blindfold.
I wonder what's got you so confident, Nines. Trying to take on the Power Elite while blindfolded.
I do not get paid enough for this...
You have got to be kidding me...
You can park here?
You're pretty tall Aella! I never get to see girls this big in Mikado.

She's tall, blonde, and has a big butt? I am definitely not in Mikado anymore.
Oh no, there's a lot of dodging in my future.
Aimee... do you really need to do it this way again?
~Player~, fair warning. You might just get shot today. Is that risk worth seeing some boobs?
Akko-chan, you think you can teach me some magic tricks?
Akko-chan, would you be willing to teach me a magic trick?
Akko-chan, there's this one magic trick I want to learn. Can you teach me it?
You don't look human. You aren't a Neighbour, are you?
Alice, right? You aren't quite human, huh? Possibly a Neighbour?
Oi, Alice, you aren't a Neighbour right? I won't attack you if you are, just curious.
Woah, Alpha? I never thought I'd get to play against an Idol!
Alpha? Can I have an autograph? Maybe a photo?
A-Alpha!? I'm a huge fan, can I get a picture with you?
Amalia... I can't wait to see just how in touch with nature you are.
Did you know I can see into the future, Amalia? I discovered a new kink looking at yours.
You have something exciting in your future, Amalia. I won't spoil it, though.
Oi, Doc, do ya really need a needle that big?
I... Don't want to know where you'll shove that needle.
Y'know what? I don't think I need a check-up after-all. Not with a needle that big.
I normally like girls who scream, but this is gonna be far too much.
Hey, if I asked you to wear a gag would you be offended?
I know I can see the future... but I've never heard it before...
I have a good feline about this game! Get it, cuz uh. None of us are cats.
Hey Blake, wanna stop kitten around and have some fun?
Nice ribbon, Blake! Uh, meow?! I had no jokes prepared.
I love an explosion as much as the next guy! But is a rocket launcher really needed?
Brock. Please do not cock block me with a rocket launcher.
When I said today was gonna be a blast, I didn't mean literally.
You look like you could kick my ass, and I wouldn't even mind!
Wanna fight? Either I win, or you beat me up. Either way I'll have a good time.
If you promise to lock my head in your thighs, I'll happily become your practice dummy.
Would I make a handsome knight, Catria?
I'd make a handsome knight, right Catria?
Refer to me as Sir Jin the Handsome. The handsomest knight you ever met. How's that, Catria?
How do you get your hair so... y'know.
And I thought I spent a lot of time on my hair in the morning...
That is a whole lotta hair, Caulifa.
What is that on your arm? Is it some sort of Trigger?
Interesting Trigger you got there, Chazz. How's it work?
Ooh, I love learning about new Triggers! What does yours do, Chazz?
Hey Chiaki-chan, what kind of game do you think I'd work best in?
If I was a video game protagonist, what sorta game would I be in?
When you look at me what kind of video game genre do you see, Chiaki-chan?
Will I really be so lucky to see an ass as famous as yours?
I never dreamed I'd get to see the booty to end all booties...
Chun-Li... please, it was my dream to get to see your booty. If not for me, do it for mini Jin.
What stylish clothes, Coco. Would be a shame if they got wrinkled from a steamy make-out sesh.
What nice clothes you got. Would look real nice on my apartment floor.
Those clothes look good on you, but would look better off you.
Hey Croix, what kind of spells can you cast?
Oi, Croix, what kind of magic do you know?
I wonder what kind of magic you know, Croix.
Wow... Cynthis... cute... Gah!
Pretty... Cynthia.. Gah, I zoned out!
Heh, I'm feeling nervous around ya, Cynthia.
Y'know Hana, we actually have a lot in common. We both defend our hometowns using hi-tech gear.
You use a mech, I use alien weapons. Yet we both kick ass to defend our town. So much in common, doncha think?
I'm glad I'm not the only cute hometown hero here. Bonus points, we both have sick gadgets!
You definitely aren't human, but you also don't seem like a Neighbour.
You aren't human, but also not a dangerous Neighbour. I'll trust ya, for now.

Wow, are you a model Elesa? Can I get an autograph? Or a date?

If a handsome and talented guy asked you out, would you say yes?
Elizabeth... it's weird, I can't quite see your future.

Sorry Emi-chan, this ain't PE class. (Though, I guess it can count as anatomy...)
Sure, french fries are cool. But have ya tried a fried rice cracker?

French fries are cool, but rice crackers are so much better!
If you're looking for a prince charming, look no further!
Hey Estelle, you look like the kinda girl to want a handsome guy in her life. Well, here I am!

If we were to go head to head, who would have the advantage? My Fujin, or your bow?
If I were to challenge you to a duel, would you feel confident with your bow versus my sword?
Hey Futaba-chan, surprised to see you in a strip poker game. Maybe you wanna see some guys naked?

You look really pretty today, Hanako-chan!
Hey Hanako-chan, you look really cute!
You look adorable today, Hanako-chan.
Haru-chan, your hair is so fluffy! Can I touch it?

I really wanna play with your hair, Haru-chan! It looks so fluffy!

Y'know Ini-chan, you seem a lot smarter than you look.

I always wanted to be with an older woman!
Heh, I've never been with a MILF before!
What I wouldn't give to go out with an older lady like yourself, Jessie!
Hey Joey-chan, wanna hear a joke?
Yo, Joey-chan, I got a joke for you!
Oi, Joey-chan, want to hear a joke?

I love your style Jolyne! When I was young, I almost started wearing my hair in a pompadour.
You're outfit is super cute, Jolyne. Almost makes me want to try my hair in a pompadour again.

I think it'd be fun to try and fight, Jotaro. Did you know I have an unusual power?
I've also got a special power, Jotaro. Wanna fight and see who's is better?
You are gorgeous, Jura. Though, you've not been with a lot of guys, huh?

Juri-chan, you give off real scary vibes. You aren't going to do anything dangerous, are ya?

You better not be planning on doing something dangerous, Juri-chan.
You give off a really powerful aura, Kamina.
You seem like a really, really strong guy.

Oi, Kazuma, which girls here are your favourite so far?

Kazuma, you've gotta have a favourite girl here. So, who is it?
Kizuna-chan? Wow, I didn't realize I'd be playing with a celebrity.

I can't believe I'm playing with the real Kizuna-chan. I feel so lucky.
Komi-chan, you're really pretty! Want to grab some tea sometime?

Komi-chan, would you want to have tea together sometime? You're very pretty.

Hello Meia-chan! I hope I can impress you, on behalf of the men of Meeden.

Woah woah woah! Such a big lady! Jin likey!

You look about ready to kick my butt, Ryuko-chan. Remind me not to piss you off.
I'd hate to make a cutie like Ryuko upset. She could seriously kick my butt!
Saki... Oh no.
Saki? Oh... oh no...
Saki..? Oh... no...
An Idol? And such a fiery one at that. Can I have an autograph, Saki-chan?
I feel so lucky! Can I have an autograph, Saki-chan?
What I wouldn't give... Can I have an autograph, Saki-chan?

Even soldiers need a break. Let's relax together, Sei.

Welcomes from Meeden, where are you from Starfire?
You aren't a hostile Neighbour, at least. Where are you from Starfire?

Moshi moshi, viewers! I'm Jin-san!
Hello viewers, I'm the handsome and talented Power Elite!

Zone, have you not been getting my emails? I'm totally down to be in your next videos!

Well let's get this done. I need to show this wannabe how you really "twist fate."
Can you keep up with Tamakoma Branches Power Elite?
Any of you want a rice cracker?
Sup, I'm single and ready to kick butt.
So you're all probably wondering what a Trion Body is! To put it in short, it's sort of like a digital reconstruction of your body.
Dealer! I want ~cards~ new ones!
Hmm, I think ~cards~ will be good.
I'll give you a rice cracker for ~cards~ more.
Gimme ~cards~ new ones. Thanks.
The power elite needs ~cards~!
Hmm, ~cards~ will be good.
Can't afford to lose. ~cards~ please.
Give me ~cards~ please, and make them good.
The Power Elite needs ~cards~ more.
Cmon cmon, ~cards~ cards!
I'm not really sure how I feel about playing with a kid...
I see more hands like this in my future.
I see clothing in my future.
I won't be stripping with this hand!

Trigger on!

This will do fine.

This will keep my from losing for now!

At least I don't think I'll be stripping.
Meh. Not good, but not bad either.
Now isn't the time for lukewarm hands!
I really need a good hand right now.
I've never been this stressed since I almost killed Four-Eyes.
Oh man, I knew I shouldn't have skipped the tutorial. (Get it? Cuz games? Hah...)
Hey, Caleb. This really isn't the best place for kids.
I'm more fucked with this hand than a country is when America finds out they have oil.
Juri... you better not be up to anything.
I'll give you a rice cracker for a better hand.
Anyone want to trade? I'll give you a rice cracker.
This is bad, but the Power Elite will always pull through!
I've fought Neighbours that gave me less trouble than this hand.
I see less clothes in my future.
Well. Shit.
H-hey! They're cheating, so maybe they should lose by default!
Wow. Just wow.
So, THIS is the future we've paved?
Well, it was nice knowing y'all!
Not an adventure, but we did have an attack on our base. Nearly had our Expedition Ship destroyed, but we managed to beat them back.
If you need a hug, Amy-chan, I'm willing to offer?
Wanna level up your sex skill with me after this game, next? I'm level 99.

Did you like...smear shit on your arms?
El Shaggy Blanco? I'm not worthy

So, what are you two planning?

Could I go with you? You need someone skilled with range!
Reason for the glasses? They look really cool. Don't you agree, Amalia?
Eat some rice crackers and take a nap.
Some people who have high Trion ability sometimes get 'Side-Effects'. Mine is seeing into the future, and it sure helps with this game.
A Neighbour is a term we use for beings not from our world. They often send massive soldiers after us to attack us! That is a Neighbour!
A Trigger is a weapon we took from the Neighbours. A Black Trigger is a more powerful one, made by someone sacrificing their life to forge it.
In Border there are 6 branches outside of HQ. I'm part of the best one, Tamakoma. It's a branch for only a few select elite within Borders ranks.
Now, a Trion Body is like a secondary body made out of this thing called Trion. I always walk around in mine.
I'm an defense agent for a group known as Border. As for Fujn, it can't hurt physical bodies, and it's more at my side as a memory than a weapon right now.
No need to worry about Fujin, it can't do anyone here harm. It means a lot to me, but I'll put it away in a bit if it is an issue.
No need to be nervous, I'm not the type to harm people without reason, and Fujin only works on Trion constructs.
I don't plan on using Fujin, really it's here more to know Mogami-sensei is watching over me.
I'm the talented power elite of an agency known as Border, and Fujin is both my weapon and keepsake. I'll put it away in a bit though, would hate to make a cute girl uncomfortable.
Fried rice crackers might be plain, but they're still my favorite. Do you want one?
You can get as feely as you want, and then I'll be the one getting lucky!
Do you want me to cum?
Nope! I'll be sticking in my Trion body for this game.
Wouldn't you like to know, hm? Don't worry. I'll show you.
The best kind of sword, here, let me show you.
A gift from Mogami-sensei. I'll give you a look.
I guess I had to catch up eventually.
Even the best stumble sometimes.
I guess even the Power Elite falters.
This won't happen often, so cherish it.
I mean, hey even Rome fell. So like. Yeah.
I didn't wanna have to cut it this close.
Guess I gotta catch up, huh?
I guess it's only fair, huh?
Eh, it had to happen I guess.
Aww, well I guess there's no choice.
Damn, well I guess I have to show some skin.

What? Me? Are you sure? I think it should be ~player~, personally.
Ok but do I HAVE to?
Oof, this is more skin than I planned on showing.
You're all pretty lucky, not many people get to see this.
Do you feel lucky, ~player~? Cuz you should.
Man, this is embarrassing.
I'll give you a rice cracker if I get to stay dressed. No? Damn.
Being the best means losing with dignity!
Even the Power Elite loses, just not often...or well, ok I mean NOW I'm losing often. It's...shuttup.
Wow, I am doing like. Really bad, aren't I?
I don't speak any french, but I'm willing to guess you're interested.
I'm sure I'll see your booty sure enough, Nami-chan!
Not even for a handsome, talented man like me?
Do you mean that, or are you just playing hard to get?
Oh, I'm sure you're interested Nines. How about a visual demonstration?

Don't worry, I'm more than just a handsome face, sexy body, and a few nice words. I'll prove it in time.
I can't blame you for being cautious, but I can prove myself.

It's a sword I fought really hard to wield. Let me show it off, if I may.
It's a sword, the best sword even. Lemme show it off Meia-chan.
Do you wanna see it? It's really big and impressive... Oh you meant the sword in my holster.

Honesty is my policy. Well, one of them. Regardless, I'll take it off next time I lose just for you, okay Meia-chan?
I can't blame you for being cautious, all I can do is prove that I'm more than just a few nice words, kay?
Yep! It's Fujin, my one-of-a-kind Black Trigger Fujin!
It sure is, wanna see it? It's pretty cool.
It's a unique sword, nothing else quite like it.
I usually wear these glasses when fighting Neighbours. Pretty cool looking, don't you think?
Time for my holster and my Black Trigger. It's called Fujin, one of the cooler triggers in Border.
Aww, now its my jacket? This is part of the Tamakoma Branch uniform. Uh, you don't mind the trivia right?
My boots now huh? Luckily I won't be walking anywhere during this game.
Well. you guys did it. You are about to experience the gift and joy that is me without a shirt on!
Ok. So now I need to take my pants off. That's cool.
You know...to be honest I don't even know if I have a dick in my Trion body...
Why not try both, and see which I prefer?
E-eheh. Looks like the future has shifted.
It's called Fujin, using this sword I can strike anything no matter the distance.
Impressive right? Fujin here slash anything be it three feet or three kilometers away.
Zoro eh? He a sword guy? Shame he wouldn't stand a chance against someone like me.
Oh come on, Nami-chan. The crackers may be a snack, but behind them is a full course meal.
But I didn't even have them on, so they aren't too important right now.
